## initializeNodeTable() function

Take a starter node table and ensure it has all the required columns (or default values)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function initializeNodeTable(table: ColumnTable, fromEdges?: boolean): ColumnTable;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  table | ColumnTable | table to turn into a standard node table |
|  fromEdges | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> indicates that the table is a list of edges to derive nodes from |

<b>Returns:</b>

ColumnTable
